title: Red Hot Love
description: An Alpha Older Firefighter Younger BBW Romance  Sara I’m a small town girl in a big city. With a suitcase full of dreams, and a past I’d rather forget, I’m soon swept off my feet by the hottest guy I have ever seen. Saved from a burning building, my hero firefighter is everything I could want in a man. But I’m only in town for a week. Can I really give my heart to him so easily? Muscular, tall, funny and sweet, it’s going to be hard for me to resist him!  Bill I’m a forty-year old bachelor with little time for love. My whole life purpose is to serve the community and run into danger whenever someone needs my help. I never imagined that my latest call would lead me to the only woman who has ever taken my breath away. Sara turns my world upside down. Curvy and beautiful, she is all I could ever want in a woman. And now that I’ve saved her I want to keep her.  'Red Hot Love' is a sweet and steamy short story romance! With no cliffhangers and a happily ever after, this insta love quick read is guaranteed to satisfy!
author: Rhona Davis
